patch 8.2.0009: VMS: terminal version doesn't build

Problem:    VMS: terminal version doesn't build.
Solution:   Move MIN definition.  Adjust #ifdefs. (Zoltan Arpadffy)

patch 8.2.0011: screen updating wrong when opeing preview window

Problem:    Screen updating wrong when opeing preview window.
Solution:   Redraw the window when the preview window opens.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0011: screen updating wrong when opeing preview window · vim/vim@5e5a98d
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0011: screen updating wrong when opeing preview window · vim/vim@5e5a98d
attachments.text: Problem: Screen updating wrong when opeing preview window. Solution: Redraw the window when the preview window opens.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/a6e8f888e7fc31b8ab7233509254fb2e2fe4089f|patch 8.2.0004: get E685 and E931 if buffer reload is interrupted>
patch 8.2.0004: get E685 and E931 if buffer reload is interrupted

Problem:    Get E685 and E931 if buffer reload is interrupted.
Solution:   Do not abort deleting a dummy buffer. (closes #5361)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0004: get E685 and E931 if buffer reload is interrupted · vim/vim@a6e8f88
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0004: get E685 and E931 if buffer reload is interrupted · vim/vim@a6e8f88
attachments.text: Problem: Get E685 and E931 if buffer reload is interrupted. Solution: Do not abort deleting a dummy buffer. (closes #5361)
